title: Let’s keep it going!!
description: The trial is set to start up again tomorrow and Amber will again be telling her lies on the stand in her highly exaggerated and theatrical manner. It is the same woman who colluded with the ACLU and the Washington Post to create the fabricated story that ruined Johnny Depp’s reputation and career. Though being charged with domestic violence in a previous relationship, which was a woman, Amber was extended the role of Ambassador for Women’s Rights. This purpose of this petition is to communicate to the ACLU that Amber Heard should not be an ambassador of women’s rights specific to domestic violence, when she herself was previously charged with such against another woman. Additionally, the trial has brought to light even more abuses against her former husband and people who worked for her. Please share this along with me.

title: Thank you!
description: I want to say thank you to all that have signed, shared, donated to this petition. I have never created a petition before but was so outraged with this issue that I just had to do something. I am blown away by the responses thus far to the petition…thanks everyone and keep sharing! :)
